tool_description: Analyzes trends in time series data to identify patterns, seasonality, growth rates, and predict future performance.

timestamps.description: Timestamps corresponding to each data point

metric_name.description: Name of the metric being analyzed

error_messages: Mismatched data length: Time series data and timestamps must have equal length.
Insufficient data: At least 10 data points required for trend analysis.
Invalid timestamps: Timestamps must be in valid ISO 8601 format and chronologically ordered.
Missing metric name: Metric name cannot be empty.
usage: Provide time_series_data array with corresponding timestamps and metric_name. The tool identifies trends and patterns in the data.

trend_direction.description: Overall trend: increasing, decreasing, or stable

growth_rate.description: Average percentage growth rate per period

trend_strength.description: Strength of trend: strong, moderate, or weak

forecast_next_period.description: Predicted value for next time period
